outline.text: Fact Sheet: Medicare Prescription Payment Plan
What is the Medicare Prescription Payment Plan?
What does the draft part one guidance include?
What will the draft part two guidance include? When will it be released?
How will Part D enrollees benefit under the Medicare Prescription Payment Plan?
Who is likely to benefit from the Medicare Prescription Payment Plan?
Will the Medicare Prescription Payment Plan reduce individuals' overall out-of-pocket costs?
When can Part D enrollees opt into the Medicare Prescription Payment Plan?
How do Part D enrollees opt into the Medicare Prescription Payment Plan?
What do plan sponsors need to tell Part D enrollees who opt into the Medicare Prescription Payment Plan?
Are individuals in the Extra Help program eligible to participate in the Medicare Prescription Payment Plan?
For Part D enrollees who have opted into the Medicare Prescription Payment Plan, what cost-sharing will they pay at the pharmacy, and how will they be billed for the amounts due?
Will opting into the program change anything about Part D benefits?
What types of drugs does the Medicare Prescription Payment Plan apply to?
Can individuals opt out of the Medicare Prescription Payment Plan once they have opted in?
Can an individual's participation be terminated from the Medicare Prescription Payment Plan? And what program participant protections will there be?
What is the role of pharmacies in this new Medicare Prescription Payment Plan?
How is CMS going to educate people with Medicare Part D about this new program?
How can the public provide input on the new Medicare Prescription Payment Plan?
